os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android
Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Apple iPhone

name: Mobile Mousetrap
short_description:
MICE ARE ON THE INTERNET!  

And they are using your mobile devices to get there.  Tiny touchscreen keyboards finally allow rodents access to the internet.

People, do you realize what's happening! Those defecating thieves are sneaking in at night and logging on using your iPhones and Androids. They've got web pages and blogs and email addresses and they are up to no good, I'm sure of it. Trust me. No mouse has ever done anything in benefit of humans, and this can only be more typical rodent underhandedness. 

This mobile app will allow the touch screen to detect little rodent paws and prevent unauthorized use.
summary: Prevent mice and other household pests from using your mobile devices.
